about_the_game: The Cross Impact Soundtrack is a collection of music inspired by the iconic tracks from indie games and thrilling battles of Cross Impact. Composed and remixed by NeatNeet and TheToonHero4, this soundtrack blends original compositions and remixes. Whether you're a seasoned fighter or a newcomer to the scene, let the Cross Impact Soundtrack fuel your passion for indie games and platform fighters alike.
detailed_description: The Cross Impact Soundtrack is a collection of music inspired by the iconic tracks from indie games and thrilling battles of Cross Impact.
